title: Trying to activate Messages for Web and getting "Dynamic Link Not Found"
content:
Since about 4PM today I've been trying to get Messages for Web to sync with my phone, but every time I click on the link in my QR Code Reader, I get a "Dynamic Link Not Found." I've tried clearing the Messages cache and reinstalling the Messages app, but nothing has changed.

Is Google's Firebase redirector hosed or am I missing something?


Thanks,
-MB
